DfsWizardBase< GR > Class Template Reference

Detailed Description

template<class GR>
class lemon::DfsWizardBase< GR >

Default traits class used by DfsWizard.

Template Parameters
GRThe type of the digraph.

#include <lemon/dfs.h>
